detail_desc: Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.

Checked cotton flannel shirt with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight cut with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, text print on the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Open back with corset lacing at the bottom, short sleeves and a narrow trim around the neckline.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.

Negligee in lace and mesh with an integral super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Joggers in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with an opening at the front and short flounced sleeves. V-neck at the back with a flounce at the top and a concealed zip. Seam at the waist and wide legs.
Imitation leather sandals. Foot straps with adjustable fasteners and a hook and loop fastening at the back.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Gently flared top in a lightweight weave with narrow shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the top.
Short, gently fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in patterned jersey with long puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with a draped effect. Small flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cotton jersey briefs with scalloped edges, an elasticated waist and a lined gusset.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with decorative draping at the front. Moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliquéd chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with a rounded collar in a broderie anglaise weave, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, pair of trousers and a hairband in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elastication around the heels. Hairband with a large bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Short, sleeveless top in a ribbed viscose blend with a stand-up collar.
Blouse in a viscose weave with long sleeves and a wrapover front with pleats and concealed press-studs.
Shirt in checked cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, two chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.

Short, padded parka woven in a cotton blend with a faux fur-trimmed hood, tab with press-studs at the top and a zip with a button band down the front. Zipped pocket at the top, front pockets with a fake flap, a flap sleeve pocket with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Shirt in a cotton weave with collar and buttons down the front. Buttoned chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a polo neck, concealed press-stud at one side of the collar and press-studs at the crotch.
Large clip earrings with pineapple-shaped pendants. Clips decorated with sparkly stones and plastic beads. Length 6.5 cm.
Sports jacket in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Two decorated with pearly plastic beads and two glittery ones. Length 6-8 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in patterned jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in a crêpe weave with a double frill at the front, elasticated straps, a concealed press-stud at one side and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Patterned pencil case in glittery imitation leather with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with terry appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit. Turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.
Gently fitted, calf-length dress in pattern-knit jersey with raglan cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Dress in embroidered mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Sewn-in satin underdress.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a small loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in rib-knit organic cotton with a turned-up, appliquéd hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and fringes. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Shorts in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery print. Zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Sports trousers in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and ribbed hems.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton flannel shirt with a chest pocket, yoke at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Studio Collection. Wide shorts in a patterned linen and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, pleats at the top and legs with creases.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with dropped shoulders, short dolman sleeves, pleats at the top of the front and a box pleat at the back of the neck.
Studio Collection. Sarong in a printed weave made from recycled polyester.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Thong briefs in soft lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in supersoft viscose jersey with a print motif and sequins on the front, short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft striped jersey with dropped shoulders with a frill.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and frayed, lace-trimmed hems.
Tops in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with open sections at the sides and back. Rings at the sides and lacing at the sides, top and back.
